name: mern-js-compiler
description: Personal JavaScript compiler using MERN stack with Nord theme

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.build: cd client && CI=false npm install && CI=false npm run build
